doc-example.doc-descr:
Student speach will be recorded. It is human evaluated control so no imediate score is visible.
Sound recording time is not limited.

header-prop.h3: Audio recording with speak-seconds-from - speak-seconds-to setting

doc-example.doc-descr:
Recording can be stopped anytime, when click outside audio-capture control and it will be stopped without saving. Modal audio recording is preferable for test use.
Sound recording is limited between speak-seconds-from and speak-seconds-to. After speak-seconds-to recording will be stopped and saved.

header-prop.h3: Audio recording with speak-seconds-to setting only

doc-example.doc-descr: Sound recording is limited to speak-seconds-to time. After speak-seconds-to recording will be stopped and saved.
